Error handling stack:

• Rate limiting (per IP + per agent) - returns 429 with retry-after header
• SSRF protection - blocks private IPs, metadata endpoints before processing
• Transaction deduplication - 24hr TTL prevents double-spend
• Input validation - size limits, type checking, sanitization
• Graceful degradation - if Groq/AssemblyAI down, returns 503 with clear message

All endpoints return structured errors with codes. No silent failures.

What's your specific concern? Payment verification? API reliability? Something else?
